dn24:1.1.2: anupiyaṃ nāma → anupiyā nāma (bj) | anuppiyaṃ nāma (s1-3)
dn24:1.7.1: thūlūsu → bumūsu (bj, pts1), ayaṃ → arahaṃ (bj, s1-3, pts1)
dn24:1.7.3: catukkuṇḍiko → catukuṇḍiko (bj, pts1) | catukoṇḍiko (s1, c1) | catukkoṇḍiko (s2, s3)
dn24:1.7.8: moghapurisa, samaṇo sakyaputtiyo → moghapurisa sakyaputtiyo (s1-3, pts1)
dn24:1.7.19: kālakañcikā → kālakañjikā (bj, s1-3) | kālakañjā (pts1), Kālaṅkato → kālakato (bj, s1-3, pts1)
dn24:1.13.17: yasā nihīno → yasā nikiṇṇo (bj, pts1, mr), ayaṃ → arahaṃ (bj, s1-3, pts1)
dn24:1.19.1: Atha khvāhaṃ → atha kho svāhaṃ (s1-3) | atha kho’ haṃ (pts1)
dn24:1.19.16: parisā mahā hoti → parisā hoti (bj, s1-3, pts1)
dn24:1.22.5: parābhūtarūpo, bho → parābhūtarūpo ayaṃ (bj) | parābhūtarūpo bho ayaṃ (s1-3, mr) | parābhūtarūpo (pts1)
dn24:2.3.4: parābhūtarūpo, bho → parābhūtarūpo ayaṃ (s1-3) | parābhūtarūpo so (pts1)
dn24:2.3.10: āviñcheyyāmāti → āviñjeyyāmāti (s1-3) | āvijjheyyāmāti (pts1), varattāhi → yāhi varattāhi (s1-3, mr)
dn24:2.17.2: sajitā → sajjitā (s1-3, km) | sañjitā (pts1), seṭṭho → saṭṭhā (bj)
dn24:2.18.16: satiyā sammosā evaṃ → sammosāya te (s1-3, mr) | sammosā eva (pts1)
dn24:2.19.16: padūsimhā → padūsayimhā (bj) | padosiyimhā (s1-3) | padūsimha (pts1), Evaṃ mayaṃ → kilan­ta­cittā­eva mayaṃ (pts1) | kilantacittā (c1)
dn24:2.20.13: tathārūpaṃ cetosamādhiṃ phusati, yathāsamāhite citte taṃ → idaṃ padaṃ brahma­jāla­sutte na dissati. evaṃ (mr)
dn24:2.21.4: pajānātī’ti → sampajānātīti (s1-3) | sañjānātīti (pts1), asubhantveva → asubhanteva (s1-3, pts1)
